Reviews.Title: “Do Not Stay Here!!”
Reviews.Author: Nette69
Reviews.Content: The website states recently renovated but based on the room I stayed in the wall paper is peeling, the tub has mold all over it, the comforters have holes and the stuffing in them is coming out, the furniture is very scratched and worn, the sink/cabinet area has separated from the wall and upon check in the chairs had mud clumps on them as well as the carpet being very dirty. For a place representing Wyndham it is very badly cared for and not worth it. As for their "breakfast" it consists of coffee and juice alone, and the free internet is a joke if you can get on at all. The rooms are very dirty at check in and roaches were seen during our stay. I would never recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “needs a better staff”
Reviews.Author: nathan garcia g Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: I had a non enjoyable stay due to the poor tvs and the staffs lack of service. the rooms wete not comfortable and that made for a horrible night. dont recommend.

Reviews.Title: “good value”
Reviews.Author: maze916
Reviews.Content: clean good value location is good rooms large and clean some noise between rooms late at night

Reviews.Title: “If you just need the basics, this motel is for you.”
Reviews.Author: GothicblueCJ
Reviews.Content: My friend, her other friend, & I stayed here for one night. It was pretty ok. Like the title says- if you just need the basics(bed, bath, sleep), then this motel will do the job. It's in a quite area- so no worries of loudness outside. I did notice a sheet on the table that stated 'Room Service' but my friend's friend stated that it was pricey(she had gotten there the night before). She said she walked on over to the Sonic- it's a couple of blocks from the motel. They do have a couple of places that deliver to the motel. The motel is located next to some woods and from the looks of it could be considered isolated. So if you are traveling by foot, then be careful when going out. If you want a no frills place to cover your basic needs as well as saving money, then I suggest this place.

Reviews.Title: “Shhh, SO QUIET!”
Reviews.Author: TeresaVzqs
Reviews.Content: I absolutely hate it when you get to a highway-side motel and it's loud, and cheap and obnoxious. This one was only cheap, but not in a bad way. We were only a few blocks away from i35, (where there's a very busy McDonald's, Sonic and other fast food restaurants) but all that is safely near-reach (even when walking) but OUT OF SIGHT. It was such a relief to avoid that mess, when all we wanted to do, was go to sleep and walk to a pancake-restaurant in the morning (I hate cereal) before an afternoon flight. It was annoying having to ask the clerk for a hair drier, an alarm, when they should have them already in the rooms; plus the tv remotes are so confusing... I would've deducted a star if the clerk hadn't been so sweet as to cater to all my questions. I really value customer service. Our room was clean, nicely sized, we even got a desk and a recliner, which was good, because I needed to finish some things on my laptop. The lack of pool is great too, since I just wanted to sleep, without rowdy kids screaming and water noise.

Reviews.Title: “No extras, but nice.”
Reviews.Author: Cawcker33
Reviews.Content: Everything seemed made to cut costs, but what it lacked in extra amenities, it made up in cleanliness, location and a fast, warm staff. I'd be staying there again within the next 6 months, definitely.

Reviews.Title: “got the job done...”
Reviews.Author: goodgirlost
Reviews.Content: My husband been out of work for over a year and i still wanted to take the kids to Six Flags. We wanted to spend more money in the park vs on the hotel. We knew all we needed to do was sleep and shower. Well this place did the job! At first when we pulled up we were like this is a hourly motel...lol...BUT the place was nice and clean. We went in Feb so the pool was not open but they did have a standard pool with beach chairs that we saw. You could see Six Flags from our room so the kids enjoyed the view from the room. And you could actually walk to Six Flags from the room! One block from this place! So, on a buget yes i would stay again!

Reviews.Title: “Do you like bed bugs and prostitution? if so pay in cash.”
Reviews.Author: sdbeachhomes
Reviews.Content: If you need a servicing from a female or want to find bed bugs in your bags this is the place for you. Pay in cash because they will charge your credit card 2x. I had to dispute the second charge with my bank. Beware walking in this area, I was hassled by some thugs walking to the McDs. By far the worst motel I have ever stayed at. Save yourself the danger/frustration and disease. Pay another $10 and stay at the embassy suites or budget suites. Lesson learned.

Reviews.Title: “Okay room, TERRIBLE service!”
Reviews.Author: freedomtothrive
Reviews.Content: The room was okay - mostly clean except for the carpet and stained chairs. The service was ridiculous! I've stayed at plenty of budget places, and never been so appalled. I was waiting to pay for my second night till after seeing the room - was in town for three days. So I slept in, and planned to go pay again around noonish. At 11:10 someone knocked at my door and OPENED IT while I was surprised and sleeping in after a late night of work! I said I wanted to stay another night and the man left. 20 minutes later the manager called wanting me to pay immediately. I offered my credit card over the phone, highly anoyed that I couldn't wait an hour, and the manager said I had to come down in person immediately and that my credit card over the phone was insufficient. REALLY?? This is how I booked my room the day before!! I asked her to reonsider, and she refused. I had to just leave, and went to the Days Inn on Preston - which was cheaper (via hotels.com) and a thousand time better! This place's service was inexcusable. I have never avoided a place because of bad service reviews, but I have never been treated this badly!

Reviews.Title: “Worthwhile, Good Rate, Very Comfortable”
Reviews.Author: DaytonDoc
Reviews.Content: I enjoyed my stay here. I would say this is a good deal for the price. Good room with clean room and quiet atmosphere. We didn't have to worry about being robbed or anything. I likd this hotel and plan on returning on all of my future trips to the area.

Reviews.Title: “Bargain!”
Reviews.Author: Lucas5915
Reviews.Content: We had to stay two days in Dallas for a concert and a game, so we were just looking for a quiet place to sleep and shower. This motel was suitable for that at a very reasonable rate: we stayed here for $49,99 a night for a double queen. The motel is located close to the freeway, so you are in Dallas within minutes. Rooms were clean and well maintained, staff was helpfull. Would surely stay again, especia;;y as all surrounding places charge twice as much!

HotelInfo.Name: Knights Inn Market Center
HotelInfo.Address: 1550 Empire Central, Dallas, TX 75235 (Formerly Red Roof)
